data: `minecraft:behavior.sneeze` allows an entity to sneeze and potentially startle other entities. While sneezing, the entity may drop an item.
`minecraft:behavior.sneeze` requires a `player` to be tagged as the entity's owner, via taming or console command.

data.Name: cooldown_time
data.Description: Time in seconds the mob has to wait before using the goal again

data.Name: drop_item_chance
data.Description: The probability that the mob will drop an item when it sneezes.

data.Name: [entity_types](../Definitions/NestedTables/entity_types.md)
data.Description: List of entity types this mob will startle (cause to jump) when it sneezes.

data.Name: loot_table
data.Description: Loot table to select dropped items from.

data.Name: prepare_sound
data.Description: Sound to play when the sneeze is about to happen.

data.Name: prepare_time
data.Description: The time in seconds that the mob takes to prepare to sneeze (while the prepare_sound is playing).

data.Name: probability
data.Description: The probability of sneezing. A value of 1.00 is 100%

data.Name: sound
data.Description: Sound to play when the sneeze occurs.

data.Name: within_radius
data.Description: Distance in blocks that mobs will be startled.

data: `entity_types` is a JSON Object variable that can use the following parameters:

data.Name: filters
data.Description: Conditions that make this entry in the list valid.

data.Name: max_dist
data.Description: Maximum distance this mob can be away to be a valid choice.

data.Name: must_see
data.Description: If true, the mob has to be visible to be a valid choice.

data.Name: must_see_forget_duration
data.Description: Determines the amount of time in seconds that this mob will look for a target before forgetting about it and looking for a new one when the target isn't visible any more.

data.Name: sprint_speed_multiplier
data.Description: Multiplier for the running speed. A value of 1.0 means the speed is unchanged.

data.Name: walk_speed_multiplier
data.Description: Multiplier for the walking speed. A value of 1.0 means the speed is unchanged.
